summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prisma v7 adapter-pg migration for db.ts. All 8 critical tests passed successfully.
passed_tests: TypeScript db.ts compilation - No errors in db.ts file
TypeScript dependent files - No new errors in storage.ts, auth.ts, analytics.ts
Total TypeScript errors count - Maintained at 20 (pre-existing), not 41+
Runtime with DATABASE_URL - Successfully prints 'OK: object' without PrismaClientInitializationError
Singleton behavior - getPrisma() returns same instance on multiple calls
Environment validation - Throws 'DATABASE_URL is not set' when missing
Export stability - getPrisma and PrismaClientType properly exported
